A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi Subverts expectations and follows its own advice to \"let the past die.\" A mix of fan service and new direction\, it moves at a snappy pace despite its running time. some pieces work better than others - a fetch-quest to a casino planet is probably the low point of the film\, but  interactions between rey and kylo ren shine as perhaps some of the best star wars moments ever.
